animals.intro: Lust is an inordinate craving for the pleasures of the body.

locations.confession: Flirted with a handsome guy today.
Dreamed dating Shawn Mendes for the whole night.
I went to a strip club.
I was watching porn for the whole night.

animals.intro: Gluttony is an inordinate desire to consume more than that which one requires.

locations.confession: Kept eating in Korean BBQ buffet for 2 hours.
Asked for extra noodles 5 times at lunch in Japanese ramen restaurant.
Ate up two extra hamburgers from my friends who are full already.

animals.intro: Greed is the desire for material wealth or gain, ignoring the realm of the spiritual.

locations.confession: Stayed in casino for eight hours trying to win my money back.
Didn’t sold the stock that had gained 20% profit which then jumped 15% later.
Borrowed money from my friends to invest as much bitcoins as possible.
Asked for more time to accept a well-paid job and kept looking for another one with higher salary package.
Asked for souvenirs more than once when attending Samsung workshop and tried to sell them for money.

animals.intro: Sloth is the avoidance of physical or spiritual work.

locations.confession: Haven’t went to gym for two months.
Took a nap at work for an hour.
Haven’t do my laundry for a while.
Didn’t go to school because I wanted to sleep at home.
Went to work without any make up.
Ate an apple without washing it.

animals.intro: Wrath is manifested in the individual who spurns love and opts instead for fury. It is also known as Wrath.

locations.confession: Yelled at my friend for something trivial.
Kept beeping the car that blocked the street.
I was fighting with my best friend because of a girl.
I broke my mom's cellphone because she yelled at me.
I yelled at a waiter because he gave me a wrong drink.

animals.intro: Envy is the desire for others' traits, status, abilities, or situation.

locations.confession: Unwilling to cooperate with colleagues who are younger and prettier than me.
I haven’t talk to my boyfriend two days after I noticed that he was texting a pretty girl.
I was talking to a girl with the sarcastic tone because she is so rich.
I said something bad about a gril because her GPA is higher than me.
I didn't invite a guy to my birthday party because he is taller than me.
I didn't appreciate for my Christmas gift from my parents because my sister got a better one.
I didn't pay attention to work because my cowoker was on a vacation in Paris.
I was so envy with my friend who had great time in Vegas edc while I have to work for the final project.

animals.intro: The Sin of Pride is said by some to the the foremost of the Seven Deadly Sins. Hubris is the gateway through all other sin enters the mortal soul.

locations.confession: I didn't go the Spring Show because I think my work is better.
Didn’t admit I was wrong to my subordinates.
I didn't change the design that my friend suggested me to, because I prefer mine.
I was laughing at a poor guy who cannot afford an iPhone.
I refused her invitation because I felt like that restaurant is so cheap.

animals.intro: Lust is an inordinate craving for the pleasures of the body.
Gluttony is an inordinate desire to consume more than that which one requires.
Greed is the desire for material wealth or gain, ignoring the realm of the spiritual. It is also called Avarice or Covetousness.
Sloth is the avoidance of physical or spiritual work.
Wrath is manifested in the individual who spurns love and opts instead for fury. It is also known as Wrath.
Envy is the desire for others' traits, status, abilities, or situation.
The Sin of Pride is said by some to the the foremost of the Seven Deadly Sins. Hubris is the gateway through all other sin enters the mortal soul.
